channel.title: CNN.com - RSS Channel - App International Edition
channel.description: CNN.com delivers up-to-the-minute news and information on the latest top stories, weather, entertainment, politics and more.

image.title: CNN.com - RSS Channel - App International Edition

item.title: Trump blasts Cohen over tape disclosure
Cars turned to molten metal as Greek wildfires wipe villages off the map
Evidence detected of lake beneath the surface of Mars
item.description: A lake of liquid water has been detected by radar beneath the southern polar ice cap of Mars, according to a new study by Italian researchers from the Italian Space Agency, published Wednesday in the journal Science.

item.title: Putin's Washington visit delayed, White House says
item.description: The follow-up meeting President Donald Trump proposed holding with his Russian counterpart in the fall will no longer happen this year, the White House said on Wednesday.

item.title: Pakistan election: 31 dead in bomb attack as voting continues
Was nerve agent left in multiple places in UK?
item.description: Investigators are looking into whether the poison used on former Russian double agent Sergei Skripal and his daughter Yulia may have been left in multiple receptacles in and around the Salisbury area, sources say.

item.title: Auto boss Sergio Marchionne dies
Hundreds missing after dam collapse floods towns
item.description: More than 10,000 people have been affected by a catastrophic dam collapse in southern Laos, according to figures published by the United Nations.

item.title: Trump's Hollywood star smashed to pieces
item.description: President Donald Trump's star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame was destroyed by a man with a pickax early Wednesday morning, according to Los Angeles police officer Ray Brown.

item.title: Vaccine crisis outrage: China calls for calm
Syria street market suicide bombing kills 38
Demi Lovato in hospital for apparent drug overdose
Viagra trial on pregnant women stopped after 11 babies die
Swedish student stops deportation of Afghan man with Facebook live protest
item.description: A student used a Facebook Live Stream to prevent the deportation of an Afghan asylum seeker on board an Istanbul-bound plane at Gothenburg airport in Sweden.

item.title: 30-ton disco ball destined for Nevada desert
item.description: Bjarke Ingels' architecture practice has set its sights on building an inflatable, 30-ton disco ball in the Nevada desert for the 2018 edition of Burning Man.

item.title: White House stops announcing calls with world leaders
US airlines give in to China's demands over Taiwan
New images show N Korea dismantling test site
item.description: President Donald Trump says that new images indicate North Korea has begun dismantling "a key missile site" -- a step he says was promised by dictator Kim Jong Un after the two leaders met in Singapore in June. CNN's Barbara Starr reports.

item.title: Roma furious over $49M transfer gazumping
Tour de France riders accidentally tear-gassed
item.description: The Tour de France -- cycling's most prestigious race -- was temporarily halted Tuesday after tear gas, used to disperse protesters by police, inadvertently got into the eyes of some riders.

item.title: Massive iceberg threatens small village
item.description: The people of Innaarsuit know how to handle themselves around ice. Their small island off western Greenland is surrounded by it through every long, dark winter. They take dogsleds out on Baffin Bay's frozen surface to hunt seals and polar bears. They cut out holes and catch fish through it. Most importantly they know when to avoid it.

item.title: US intel warns of Russian threat to power grid
item.description: CNN's Jim Sciutto reports that US intelligence believes Russia has the capability to hack several US infrastructures, including voting systems and electrical grids.

item.title: 'Nobody needs to die of AIDS anymore,' Elton John says
item.description: Among scourges like malaria, diabetes and cancer, AIDS is "the only disease that could legitimately be ended in our lifetime," if only old-fashioned attitudes and society could be changed, Elton John said Tuesday.

item.title: Thai soccer boys to become monks
item.description: The young Thai soccer team whose dramatic evacuation from a cave captured the world's attention took their first steps in becoming novice Buddhist monks on Tuesday, in a ceremony intended to honor their rescuers.

item.title: Man accused of supporting ISIS in Syria transferred to US for prosecution
White House edits out Putin's support for Trump
item.description: CNN analyst Max Boot says it's "Orwellian" that the White House omitted Russian President Vladimir Putin verbally confirming that he supported President Trump in the 2016 election from the Helsinki summit transcript.

item.title: Ivanka Trump is shutting down her company
item.description: Ivanka Trump has decided to wind down her company after deciding to pursue a career in public policy instead of returning to her fashion company.

item.title: Tesla's real problem is its scramble for cash
Southern Europe's huge, hidden lake
item.description: Straddling the border of Montenegro and Albania, Lake Skadar is a unspoiled, relaxing haven for wildlife and visitors seeking to explore an area steeped in beauty and history.

item.title: Guess who wants to gut the Endangered Species Act
Famed 'Ferris Bueller' Ferrari up for auction
item.description: The Ferrari replica famously featured in "Ferris Bueller's Day Off" can be yours ... for the right price.

item.title: China cuts taxes to protect economy against trade war
The feminist DJs taking back the night
item.description: https://cnn.it/2JQYFqd

item.title: The 15-year-old off-road sensation
Hidden secrets in buildings
Crazy $1 billion theme park opens
Why these kids are suing their governments
Top Instagram influencer says: Get a real job
Open champ underestimates wealth -- by nearly $12M
Five great American buildings you'll never see
Photos capture shifts in society
What your sexual fantasies say about you
US President: 'What kind of a lawyer would tape a client? So sad!'
item.description: President Donald Trump blasted his former attorney Michael Cohen on Wednesday, the morning after CNN aired the audio of a recording Cohen made of the two.

item.title: Caught in a lie, Trump turns to conspiracy theory
item.description: Less than 12 hours after being caught in a lie about his knowledge of a payoff to former Playboy model Karen McDougal, President Donald Trump turned to an old friend for solace: The conspiracy theory.

item.title: Trump on tape discussing buying rights to Playboy model's story
Listen to the conversation for yourself
The night Cohen went to war with Trump
Pakistan election: 31 dead as bomb attack mars voting
Pompeo testifies on Russia and N. Korea
Politician: LGBT community 'unproductive'
item.description: A Japanese politician has come under fire for questioning whether LGBT taxpayers should receive equal welfare benefits to the rest of Japan.
